fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Foul Legacy - Raging Tide
**2)** Elemental Burst: Havoc - Obliteration
**3)** Normal Attack: Cutting Torrent

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Childe's Talents:
Burst and Skill contribute roughly the same amount of damage in the rotation, so both should be levelled equally, NAs is the last priority but shouldn't be neglected since he CAs in Downtime as well

Childe's Artifacts:
Most 4HoD and variations of 2p2p of Hod and any other set such as WT, NO, atk%, so go with what makes you get better subs.
